message: Cool.. What tools do you have access to?

I have access to the following tools:

- `trend_research`: This tool helps me research trending topics on LinkedIn to inform your content strategy.  I use this when you ask about trends or need trending topics related to a specific subject.

- `content_research`: This tool helps me gather relevant information from the web to support your content creation efforts. I use this when you need help researching a topic for a LinkedIn post or article.

- `content_creation_tool`: This tool helps me generate engaging LinkedIn posts or articles based on the research I conduct and any feedback you provide.  I use this after I've done the research to actually write the content.
